column5: A centrally-located vacation oceanfront home right on the Seawall, only one hundred steps from the beach!  Open space with lots of light, high ceilings, fully furnished. Wake up to stunning views sunrise on the beach anywhere you sleep. The master bedroom, loft bedroom, and living room all have views of the ocean front. Cook a delicious meal in our fully-equipped kitchen and eat together at the dining table while watching sunset on the beach. Dip into the hot tub at one of two pools.
column8: Beautiful Oceanfront Condo with Private Balcony
